short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily make rBux suggestions right on a product or service page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The rBux Referral Commerce Platformâ„¢ provides a social platform for consumers to refer products and earn rewards.

Referring with rBux is easy:
1. Select a product that you love and that you think others will love as well.
2. Refer via social media such as Facebook, Twitter, and more, or directly email it to one or many of your friends.
3. When you refer a registered product and your referral leads to a purchase, you'll receive rBux as a reward for your hard work which you can redeem with any partnered vendor to get discounts and buy more great products!

While you may only earn rBux with registered products from partnered vendors, that doesn't stop you from referring any product you wish.  You can suggest products to rBux, which you can then refer just like normal.  With the rBux Suggestion extension, suggestion is easy and can be performed from any product or service page.  The extension does the hard part - all you have to do is tweak the title and description to your heart's desire, pick the best image from the provided list, and click the "Save Suggestion" button!

A free rBux member account is required to make suggestions on rBux.  Learn more at https://rbux.com/
